title: (x) What are these two typefaces? - Rosewood Fill, Troubadour Open aka Rechtman {self (Ascender), Akira}
content:
Please help me out...I did this YEARS ago and I can't find the editable file and I can't remember which typefaces I used. I need to know both of them (script and serif) because one of my clients wants me to use them.

thanks in advance!!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141124153133im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SampleType_5833.jpg)
author: shielddesign

comments.content: Okay so now we know that the serif is rosewood fill...thanks! What is the script one? Thanks!
Thanks akira! you saved my life : )
